tokens.name: title
tokens.example: Guess who claimed Ariana Huffington is unattractive, both inside and out. This person fully understands why her former husband left her for a man and thinks he made a good decision.

example.en: I will build a great wall – and nobody builds walls better than me, believe me – and I’ll build them very inexpensively. I will build a great, great wall on our southern border, and I will make Mexico pay for that wall. Mark my words.
